server.facade

Interface IMovesFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServerFacade, MockServerFacade, ServerFacade

    public interface IMovesFacade
    An API for the moves. that can happen during game play.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientModel acceptTrade(int gameID, PlayerIndex playerIndex, boolean willAccept)
      Update model and remove the TradeOffer Update both players' PlayerBank depending on whether the TradeOffer is accepted or not.
      ClientModel buildCity(int gameID, PlayerIndex playerIndex, VertexLocation vertexLocation)
      Increase the client player's city of AmountType.BUILT by 1.
      ClientModel buildRoad(int gameID, PlayerIndex playerIndex, EdgeLocation roadLocation, boolean isFree)
      Increase the client player's road of AmountType.BUILT by 1.
      ClientModel buildSettlement(int gameID, PlayerIndex playerIndex, VertexLocation vertexLocation, boolean isFree)
      Increase the client player's settlement of AmountType.BUILT by 1.
      ClientModel buyDevCard(int gameID, PlayerIndex playerIndex)
      Add a random Development Card to the client player's PlayerBank Pop said Development Card from the DevCardDeck Display bought Development Card message.
      ClientModel discardCards(int gameID, PlayerIndex playerIndex, Resources discardedCards)
      The client player discards a number of each resource.
      ClientModel finishTurn(int gameID, PlayerIndex playerIndex)
      Calls finish turn from the model to progress to next state.

      The client player trades with the game bank based on the trade ratio that is available to the player

      Increase the client player's roads of AmountType.BUILT by 2 Decrease the client player's roads of AmountType.AVAILABLE by 2 Update the map with the 2 new roads Display 2 roads built message

    • Method Detail

      • sendChat

        ClientModel sendChat(int gameID,
                     PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                     java.lang.String content)
              throws CatanException
        Add a message to the ClientModel with the sender's id
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the person sending the chat.
        content - the content of the chat.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • rollNumber

        ClientModel rollNumber(int gameID,
                       PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                       int number)
                throws CatanException
        Distribute resources to players based on the number rolled
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the player rolling the number.
        number - the number rolled.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • robPlayer

        ClientModel robPlayer(int gameID,
                      PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                      PlayerIndex victim,
                      HexLocation location)
               throws CatanException
        Move the robber to the new given location. Increase the robbed resource client player's PlayerBank. Decrease the robbed resource from the robbed player's PlayerBank.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the playing doing the robbing.
        victim - the index of the player being robbed.
        location - the new location of the robber.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • finishTurn

        ClientModel finishTurn(int gameID,
                       PlayerIndex playerIndex)
                throws CatanException
        Calls finish turn from the model to progress to next state.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player finishing the turn.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • buyDevCard

        ClientModel buyDevCard(int gameID,
                       PlayerIndex playerIndex)
                throws CatanException
        Add a random Development Card to the client player's PlayerBank Pop said Development Card from the DevCardDeck Display bought Development Card message.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player buying a card.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • yearOfPlenty

        ClientModel yearOfPlenty(int gameID,
                         PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                         ResourceType resource1,
                         ResourceType resource2)
                  throws CatanException
        Increase up to two resources to the client player's PlayerBank Decrease the appropriate resources from the game bank. Display resources received message.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player playing the card.
        resource1 - the first resource.
        resource2 - the second resource.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • roadBuilding

        ClientModel roadBuilding(int gameID,
                         PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                         EdgeLocation spot1,
                         EdgeLocation spot2)
                  throws CatanException
        Increase the client player's roads of AmountType.BUILT by 2 Decrease the client player's roads of AmountType.AVAILABLE by 2 Update the map with the 2 new roads Display 2 roads built message
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player playing the card.
        spot1 - the first location to build a road.
        spot2 - the second location to build a road.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • soldier

        ClientModel soldier(int gameID,
                    PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                    PlayerIndex victimIndex,
                    HexLocation location)
             throws CatanException
        Update the map with the new Robber location. Increase the client player's PlayerBank with the robbed resource. Decrease the robber player's PlayerBank with the robber resource. Display robbed message.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player playing the card.
        victimIndex - the index of the player being robbed.
        location - the new location of the robber.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • monopoly

        ClientModel monopoly(int gameID,
                     PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                     ResourceType resource)
              throws CatanException
        Updates the client player's PlayerBank with the resources gained. Updates all other players' PlayerBank with the resources lost.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player playing the card.
        resource - the resource the card is being played for.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • monument

        ClientModel monument(int gameID,
                     PlayerIndex playerIndex)
              throws CatanException
        Increase the client player's Victory Points by 1
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player playing the card.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • buildRoad

        ClientModel buildRoad(int gameID,
                      PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                      EdgeLocation roadLocation,
                      boolean isFree)
               throws CatanException
        Increase the client player's road of AmountType.BUILT by 1. Decrease the client player's road of AmountType.AVAILABLE by 1. Update the map with a new road.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player building the road.
        roadLocation - the location where the road is being built.
        isFree - if the road is free (only in setup state).
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • buildSettlement

        ClientModel buildSettlement(int gameID,
                            PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                            VertexLocation vertexLocation,
                            boolean isFree)
                     throws CatanException
        Increase the client player's settlement of AmountType.BUILT by 1. Decrease the client player's settlement of AmountType.AVAILABLE by 1. Update the map with a new settlement
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player building the settlement.
        vertexLocation - the location of the settlement.
        isFree - if the settlement is free (only in setup state).
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • buildCity

        ClientModel buildCity(int gameID,
                      PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                      VertexLocation vertexLocation)
               throws CatanException
        Increase the client player's city of AmountType.BUILT by 1. Decrease the client player's city of AmountType.AVAILABLE by 1. Update the map with a new city
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player building the city.
        vertexLocation - the location of the city.

        the updated ClientModel

      • offerTrade

        ClientModel offerTrade(int gameID,
                       PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                       TradeOffer offer,
                       PlayerIndex receiver)
                throws CatanException
        Update model with a new TradeOffer object Player to be traded is asked to trade.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player offering the trade.
        offer - the offer being sent.
        receiver - the intended receiver of the trade.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • acceptTrade

        ClientModel acceptTrade(int gameID,
                        PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                        boolean willAccept)
                 throws CatanException
        Update model and remove the TradeOffer Update both players' PlayerBank depending on whether the TradeOffer is accepted or not.
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player sending the command.
        willAccept - whether or not the player will accept the trade offered them.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • maritimeTrade

        ClientModel maritimeTrade(int gameID,
                          PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                          TradeRatio ratio,
                          ResourceType inputResource,
                          ResourceType outputResource)
                   throws CatanException
        The client player trades with the game bank based on the trade ratio that is available to the player
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player doing the trade.
        ratio - the ratio at which to trade.
        inputResource - the resource the player is trading away.
        outputResource - the resource the player is trading for.
        Returns:
        the updated ClientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException

      • discardCards

        ClientModel discardCards(int gameID,
                         PlayerIndex playerIndex,
                         Resources discardedCards)
                  throws CatanException
        The client player discards a number of each resource. The resources are returned to the game bank
        Parameters:
        gameID - the id of the game to execute the command on.
        playerIndex - the index of the player discarding.
        discardedCards - the cards discarded.
        Returns:
        the updated CLientModel
        Throws:
        CatanException
